tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE historical_market_data (
    instrument_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    instrument_name VARCHAR(255),
    market_date DATE,
    opening_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    closing_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    highest_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    lowest_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    volume INT
);

CREATE TABLE historical_data (
  symbol VARCHAR(255),
  date DATE,
  open DECIMAL,
  high DECIMAL,
  low DECIMAL,
  close DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE backtest_results (
  result_id INT,
  strategy_id INT,
  symbol VARCHAR(255),
  date DATE,
  pnl DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE price_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  instrument_id INT,
  date DATE,
  open DECIMAL,
  high DECIMAL,
  low DECIMAL,
  close DECIMAL,
  volume INT
);

CREATE TABLE trade_history (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_id INT,
  instrument_id INT,
  date DATE,
  action TEXT,
  quantity INT,
  price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
    symbol VARCHAR(10),
    date DATE,
    open_price FLOAT,
    high_price FLOAT,
    low_price FLOAT,
    close_price FLOAT,
    volume INT
);
